item.description:
There is going to be a lecture at Southern Connecticut State University if anyone wants to learn more about events going on in Darfur.

The Southern Connecticut State University Office of Academic Affairs and The Women's Center and the Anthropology Department in collaboration with the school of Health and Human Services, the Departments of English, Foreign Languages, History, Philosophy and Public Health, as well as the Honors College, Women's Studies, SCSU Amnesty International and the SCSU First Year Experience Program are pleased to present:

Eric Reeves Professor of English Language and Literature, Smith College will give a lecture entitled:
http://www.sudanreeve...

Genocide in Darfur
Tuesday September 18, 2007
5:00-6:00
Engleman Hall A120

Reception to Follow in EN B 121 (A and B)

http://www.sudanreeve...

Map of the campus http://www.southernct...

I will send my contact information to those who sign up as Yes' or Maybe
item.name: An Important Service Announcement
